Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at 39th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Morgan, 35th, Ashland and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 39th, Morgan, 35th, Ashland and 39th, due to street blockage near 39th/Morgan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near 79th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses temp. rerouted SB: 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Halsted, 79th and Emerald into terminal; NB: Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Vincennes, due to street blockage near 79th/Vincennes.

Southbound buses will operate via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Halsted, 79th and Emerald into terminal.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
